deck.question: The tag that contains a collection of metadata elements that describe the document or provide instructions to the browser
The css selector that matches the child element that is a child of the parent element
The property of an element that returns the HTML code within itself
deck.notes:
HTML code stored within a page element is referenced using element.innerHTML where element is an object reference to an element within a web document. For example: /* Display the current date and time */document.getElementById('dateNow').innerHTML = 'm/d/y
h:m:s'
